About
ECB is source code browser for Emacs. It displays a couple of windows that can be used to browse directories, files and methods. It supports method parsing for Java, C, C++, Elisp etc.

Dependencies
ECB requires version 1.3.3 or higher of Eric Ludlam's semantic bovinator. If you use ECB for Java development you also need version 2.1.9 or higher of JDE.
If you use XEmacs you must have the fsf-compat package installed (contains overlay.el).

Developers
Jesper Nordenberg
Klaus Berndl
Kevin A. Burton
Eric M. Ludlam

Feedback
Please feel free to contact me if you find the code browser useful, if you have found some bugs or if you some suggestions on how to improve it.
Jesper Nordenberg
